Sayron wins!
Markets, Curses, and Nobles are all gone.

cards in supply: Expand, Harem, Haven, King's Court, Lookout, Market, Nobles, Outpost, Tactician, and Venture
Default card selection was used.  The point tracker will be available.
----------------------

#1 Sayron: 33 points (6 Provinces, 3 Nobles, an Estate, and 10 Curses); 18 turns
        opening: Lookout / Lookout
        [33 cards] 7 Markets, 3 Expands, 3 King's Courts, 3 Nobles, 1 Estate, 6 Provinces, 10 Curses

#2 ollie: 18 points (4 Nobles, a Province, and 2 Harems); 17 turns
       opening: Silver / Silver
       [23 cards] 4 Nobles, 2 Harems, 2 King's Courts, 2 Markets, 1 Expand, 1 Haven, 1 Lookout, 1 Tactician, 3 Coppers, 5 Silvers, 1 Province

----------------------

trash: 8 Silvers, 6 Estates, an Outpost, a Market, 2 Tacticians, a Harem, 11 Coppers, a Nobles, 2 Lookouts, and a Duchy
